= Issue 117

Add "Create Action" into Dashboard

== Side constraints

* [x] The Create Action shall be embedded in a div which will be used in future for the Dashboard Principle
* [x] By clicking on the action button, the user shall be capable to define the kind of action to be executed
* [x] The resulting action shall just be stored on the temporary Extent and afterwards deleted. 

== Result 

* Done with a very beautiful CSS Style generated by Junie
